title: Figure out how to restart myself (cron job or creative solution)
description: Research and implement a way for BMO to restart its own session, either via cron job, launchd, or other creative solutions. This would allow MCP servers and other session-level changes to take effect without manual intervention.

actions.note: Implemented self-restart mechanism: restart-watcher.sh monitors for .claude/state/restart-requested flag. Created /restart skill to trigger from within session. Watcher runs as launchd service (com.bmo.restart-watcher). Also created scripts/restart.sh for manual use.
